title: What's New for Search in Azure Maps? | Azure Friday
excerpt: In this episode, you'll learn about doing a nearby search, searching within a given geometry and how to search along a route providing a maximum detour time. Julie Kohler joins Scott Hanselman to discuss the newest search APIs that have been added to Azure Maps.  For more information:  â€¢ Azure Maps product
